HiddenText.Name: My Pathway student wants to meet really late at night, like 1:00 AM. I don’t want to meet at that time; what do I do?
HiddenText.OpenningText: My Pathway student wants to meet really late at night, like 1:00 AM. I don’t want to meet at that time; what do I do?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Tell him or her that you can’t meet at that time, and try to find another time to meet. It’s important that these meetings take place at times that work well for both of you.
